website_summaries.verdict: Two words - comfort and style. The Ecco Kyle Classic showcases an eye-catching classic look with premium materials that will add throwback vibe to one's overall modern ensemble. It brags about its finest quality materials that furnish excellent comfort and durability without compromising its on-trend Danish style. While this shoe leans towards the pricey range, it sure is worth every penny for it blended the timeless style, comfort, and durability, effortlessly.

customer_reviews.title: Consider Ordering Two Sizes
customer_reviews.text: While these certainly run large, I’m hesitant to say you should just order an entire size down because the sizing goes up and down by a whopping 1.5 inches. That said, I usually wear a size 12, and the “12 - 12.5” size was a solid inch too large in both the dark gray and mahogany colors... Ultimately both of these shoes are of the usual (great) quality that comes with the ECCO brand, but this specific model does indeed seem to be sized differently/larger compared to other ECCO shoe models, so just consider buying two sizes of the same color and then return the one that doesn’t fit.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Only uncomfortable Ecco I ever tried on
customer_reviews.text: I love Ecco shoes. They have appropriate cushion and nice arch support. For some reason these shoes have neither. Did Ecco really make them? If you want hard soled sneakers that have no arch support, you might like these. The fit was fine. I wear a 9 medium in almost all street shoes and the size. 42 worked for me
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like them
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like them, but the insole is so thin that it's like walking on a hard surface. Also the back of the left shoe cut into my ankle a bit. It just wasn't comfortable. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Fit small
customer_reviews.text: My husband has these in black and we bought the same size in brown. The brown ran much smaller!
customer_reviews.author: Jenjen777

customer_reviews.title: Style, comfort, and quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair of ECCO shoes. I like the quality and style. I bought a half size larger than usual knowing that ECCO shoes run a bit small in my experience. The Kyle classic is super comfortable and felt great from the moment I slipped them on. Very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Dave O.

customer_reviews.title: Cordovan ecco shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, attractive, casual shoe. DSW had same shoe, same price; but not tye size I wanted. Whatever size you wear, go up 1/2 size because of slightly tapered toe box.
customer_reviews.author: Kique

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these! Looks great and fits perfectly. The leather is soft and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: NAshe

customer_reviews.title: Not Comfortable/Too Small
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are not nearly as comfortable as typical Eccos. They do not offer much support and are not comfortable to walk in. They are also pretty tight in the toe area.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes, little uncomfortable and a bit large
customer_reviews.text: the internal cushion/tongue is little uncomfortable, but overall, the shoes looks great, genuine leather and quality workmanship, kind of larger than what expected for euro size 40.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Yousif

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe. Get 1/2 to a full size small.
customer_reviews.author: Nikhil

product_meta.title: ECCO Men's Kyle Classic Sneaker
product_meta.description: Finished with a sporty mix of materials, the clean-lined ECCO kyle slip-on sneaker is the ideal summer staple. A cushioned, contrast-colored sole adds a fresh touch, while padding at the ankle provides additional comfort.
feature_bullets: Crafted from full-grain leather with suede detailing
Textile lining offers softness and breathability
Lightweight sole provides cushioning and flexibility, using innovative ECCO FLUIDFORM direct comfort Technology
Elastic panels ensure the shoe is easy to put on
Removable, textile-covered insole for added comfort and customizable fit
